tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE genomics_data (
    gene_name VARCHAR(255),
    pathway_name VARCHAR(255),
    gene_expression FLOAT,
    pathway_activity BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE DrugTargets (
  target_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  target_name VARCHAR(255),
  gene_id INT,
  pathway_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (gene_id) REFERENCES GenomicsData(gene_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (pathway_id) REFERENCES GenomicsData(pathway_id)
);
